newsitem.title: USA: NYH jet fuel diffs ease, Gulf levels seen steady.
newsitem.headline: NYH jet fuel diffs ease, Gulf levels seen steady.

text.p: New York Harbor (NYH) jet fuel prices inched lower in lackluster trade Thursday, though gains on the NYMEX pushed outright prices higher.
On the NYMEX, May heating settled up 0.52 cent on the day, boosted by tightness in the nearby heating oil market.
NYH prompt 54-grade jet fuel changed hands at 3.50 cents over the screen, down about 0.25 cents from late Wednesday levels.
US Gulf jet fuel diffs were unchanged on the day, with barrels for delivery on the front and back 12th cycle of the Colonial Pipeline offered at 0.25 cent under the screen.
